ja: ソニックと秘密のリング

en: First, let's find the king's palace.
ja: まずは王宮を目指すんだよな

en: That pillar is being manipulated by magic! Look out!
Whoops! Time to make a U-turn!
It's so hot! Even my quills are sweating!
Stay clear. This is no time for a sand bath!
Man, I've got sand in my shoes!
Just past that pier is the town.
A town! The king's palace must be close!
There it is! I see it!
Shara!\nLet me show you just how fast I am!
Aha, he seems pretty tough.\nAll right, let's do this!
The big eyeball on its back seems to be its weak point!
Watch out for its tail attack!
Try using the scorpion's tail to reach the eye on its back!
That's it! The eye is its weak point!
This guy just doesn't give up!
Looks like he can't take much more of this!
Sorry, but you were in my way.
